entries.abort: You have abandoned the freighter to a dire fate.
entries.angry_disable: Good work, now get us repaired and out of here.
entries.arrival_phase_1: pcontrast3 Nirame: < pcontrast1 The freighter made a short hyperspace jump, it will take a moment to pin point. pcontrast3 >
entries.arrival_phase_2: pcontrast3 Nirame: < pcontrast1 There, get over and begin the extraction before the Imperials notice you are here. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Enemy craft detected on attack vector. pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 Hostile Activity has stopped. pcontrast3 >
entries.complete: The freighter has safely been recovered.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 An escorting craft has been destroyed, %DI remian. pcontrast3 >
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < pcontrast1 All escorting craft have been destroyed. pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_destroy: The freighter has been destroyed, you fail.
entries.failed_escape: The freighter has jumped from the system, you fail.
entries.quest_disable_d: Destroy the targets engines to disable them
entries.quest_escort_d: Escort the target safely out of the system
entries.quest_recover_d: Pull up next to the target to begin the recovery process
entries.recovery_success: The freighter has safely been recovered.
entries.split_quest_alert: pcontrast3 Nirame: < pcontrast1 With their forces scrambling to attack you they have left one of their own craft waiting for an escort.  Go liberate their shuttle as they tried from our 'friends' here. pcontrast3 >
entries.target_disabled: The primary objective has been disabled, proceed with capture operations.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Recover the Captured Freighter
entries.title_d: Recover the captured Black Sun craft from Imperial custody
